subject: Dear Lucky Beneficiary
body:
Dear Lucky Beneficiary
This is to inform you that your Olympic,  UEFA Champions league and
Coca Cola Lotto winning price of $22,500,000.00 USD  million United
states Dollars
awarded to you have been credited into An already Activated ATM Visa Card
has already been shipped to you through UPS Delivery company.
You should urgently reconfirm your full information for the accurate
delivery to your home address
Full Name
Phone Number
Country
Nearest Airport
AGE & SEX
On the receipt of the above payment, your tracking number will be
given to you immediately to enable you track your package until it
gets to your home address.
The only fee needed from you is the sum of $50 for the certificate of
Claim
, this is the only ever fee needed from you, I tried to deliver
the ATM card without you paying the fees but it was stopped at
Washington Airport, once I receives the confirmation of your
information I will send your tracking number so you can see it and
confirm by yourself.
Once I hear from you I will send you the information to send the $50
for the Certificate of Claim fee.
Thanks & Best Regards
VIVIAN F. Doglas
Chief Award Payment Director

subject: Re: Dear Lucky Beneficiary
body:
Hello Vivian F. Doglas,

Thank you for your message and the exciting news about my winnings! I can't believe I've won such a large amount from the Olympic, UEFA Champions League, and Coca Cola Lotto. This is truly a surprise!

I'm curious to know more about this process. How was I selected as the winner? And could you please explain more about this ATM Visa Card that has been credited with my prize money?

Also, you mentioned a fee for the claim. Could you provide more details on what this fee is for? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Katherine
